statement.p: The cost of a private pilot course is 1197. The flight portion costs 555 more than the ground school portion. What is the cost of the flight portion alone?
a) Let \displaystyle{x} represent the cost of the ground school portion. Write a variable expression to represent the cost of the flight portion.
b) The total cost of the private pilot course can be represented by: Cost of ground school portion + Cost of flight portion = Total Cost
Fill in the boxes using the information from the problem and your expressions from part a:
c) Solve the equation \displaystyle{x}+{\left({x}+{555}\right)}={1197} to answer the question.
e) We used the expression \displaystyle{x}+{555} to represent the cost of the flight portion. Knowing that \displaystyle{x}={321} , what is the cost of the flight portion alone?
